issue.title: www.documaniatv.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

AdGuard v4.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.documaniatv.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Issue

When browsing to https://www.documaniatv.com and clicking on any episode you get a popup about an ad blocker being detected and you get redirected back to the main page.

It's the same as reported previously in [issue 128774](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/128774) but I assume the logic has been updated since the commit that fixed it then

The same issue also got reported to [uBlock Origin](https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/14115) if you want to see what they did

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/20758758/50093f8f-fe17-4c22-9d6a-02554da41b3d)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

AdGuard v4.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.documaniatv.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Issue

When browsing to https://www.documaniatv.com and clicking on any episode you get a popup about an ad blocker being detected and you get redirected back to the main page.

It's the same as reported previously in [issue 128774](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/128774) but I assume the logic has been updated since the commit that fixed it then

The same issue also got reported to [uBlock Origin](https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/14115) if you want to see what they did

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

This is when accessing https://www.documaniatv.com/ciencia-y-tecnologia/mayday-catastrofes-aereas-autorizado-para-el-desastre-video_8ca18ee8c.html as an example

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/20758758/50093f8f-fe17-4c22-9d6a-02554da41b3d)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Fixed, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.
Please enable `AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter` (if it's not enabled) and manually update filters after about 2 hours.
